parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Returns true if given treeview item is selected.

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> control [[tvIsSelected]] path

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> path: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[tvIsSelected]] [0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[tvSelection]] [[tvSetSelected]]
</value></part></template></root>
